entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
